-- | Unicode characters
--   
--   Unicode characters - automatically generated from the opentheory
--   package haskell-char-1.41
@package opentheory-char
@version 1.41


module OpenTheory.Data.Unicode
newtype Plane
Plane :: Byte -> Plane
unPlane :: Plane -> Byte
newtype Position
Position :: Word16 -> Position
unPosition :: Position -> Word16
newtype Unicode
Unicode :: (Plane, Position) -> Unicode
unUnicode :: Unicode -> (Plane, Position)
equalPlane :: Plane -> Plane -> Bool
equalPosition :: Position -> Position -> Bool
equal :: Unicode -> Unicode -> Bool
planeFromRandom :: Random -> (Plane, Random)
positionFromRandom :: Random -> (Position, Random)
fromRandom :: Random -> (Unicode, Random)


module OpenTheory.Data.Unicode.UTF8
isContinuationByte :: Byte -> Bool
parseContinuationByte :: Parser Byte Byte
parseTwoContinuationBytes :: Parser Byte (Byte, Byte)
parseThreeContinuationBytes :: Parser Byte (Byte, (Byte, Byte))
decoder :: Parser Byte Unicode
decodeStream :: Stream Byte -> Stream Unicode
decode :: [Byte] -> Maybe [Unicode]
encoder :: Unicode -> [Byte]
encode :: [Unicode] -> [Byte]
